Class CompanyController

java.lang.Object
logic.controller.AbstractController<Company>
logic.controller.company.CompanyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller<Company>
public class CompanyController extends AbstractController<Company>
CompanyController class extending Controller class parametrized with Company class.

    • getDao

      protected CompanyMongoDao getDao()
      Description copied from class: AbstractController
      Get the DAO used by the specific controller in order to call its DAO methods. Should be the DAO which manage the entity managed by the controller.
      Specified by:
      getDao in class AbstractController<Company>
      Returns:
      the DAO of the specific Controller (CompanyDao).

    • promoteNewMasterManager

      public org.bson.types.ObjectId promoteNewMasterManager(org.bson.types.ObjectId companyId, org.bson.types.ObjectId newMasterManagerId) throws BadArgumentsException
      Promote a user to masterManager.
      Parameters:
      companyId - The id of the company.
      newMasterManagerId - The id of the new masterManager.
      Returns:
      The id of the updated company if the promotion was successful, throws a BadArgumentsException otherwise.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException - if the user or the company doesn't exist.

    • acceptRequest

      public org.bson.types.ObjectId acceptRequest(org.bson.types.ObjectId companyId) throws BadArgumentsException
      Accept a request to create a Company.
      Parameters:
      companyId - The id of the company to accept.
      Returns:
      The id of the accepted company if the operation is successful, else throws an exception.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException - If the company does not exist or if the company is already accepted.

    • refuseRequest

      public org.bson.types.ObjectId refuseRequest(org.bson.types.ObjectId companyId) throws BadArgumentsException
      Refuse a request to publish a new Company.
      Parameters:
      companyId - The id of the company to refuse.
      Returns:
      The id of the refused company if the operation was successful, else throw an exception.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException - If the company does not exist or if the company has already been accepted by an Admin.

    • findAllAccessibleCompanies

      public List<Company> findAllAccessibleCompanies()
      Return the list of companies that are accessible.
      Returns:
      The list of accessible companies if any, throws a NotFoundException otherwise.

    • findAllUnaccessibleCompanies

      public List<Company> findAllUnaccessibleCompanies()
      Return the list of companies that are not accessible.
      Returns:
      The list of companies that are not accessible if there are any, a NotFoundException is thrown otherwise.

    • addManager

      Add a manager to a company.
      Parameters:
      companyId - The id of the company.
      managerId - The id of the manager to add.
      Returns:
      The id of the updated company if the manager was added, throws a BadArgumentsException otherwise.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException - if the company or the manager does not exist.

    • removeManager

      public org.bson.types.ObjectId removeManager(org.bson.types.ObjectId companyId, org.bson.types.ObjectId managerId) throws BadArgumentsException
      Removes a manager from a company.
      Parameters:
      companyId - The id of the company.
      managerId - The id of the manager.
      Returns:
      The id of the company if the manager was removed successfully, else throws a BadArgumentsException.
      Throws:
      BadArgumentsException - If the company or the manager does not exist.
